thread.title: MSG-2 The Messenger box office: Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh Insan’s movie collects Rs 300 crore!
thread.title_full: MSG-2 The Messenger box office: Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh Insan’s movie collects Rs 300 crore!

author: Shweta Parande
title: MSG-2 The Messenger box office: Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh Insan’s movie collects Rs 300 crore!
text:
MSG-2 The Messenger box office: Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh Insan’s movie collects Rs 300 crore! By Shweta Parande on October 13, 2015 at 9:04 AM Comments 
We don’t know whether to believe these box office figures or not, but godman Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh Insan’s movie MSG-2 The Messenger has crossed Rs 300 crore at the box office in India and overseas. The film is steady in its fourth week in theatres across India, even though it was banned in states like Jharkhand and Chhattisgarh in the north. 
Gurmeet Ram Rahim tweeted about the film’s record-breaking Rs 300 crore box office collections this morning and also last evening. He posted with a set of smileys, “#MSG2Crossed300 Good Morning.God bless you all”. 
He also shard pictures of his followers watching the movie in theatres in north India and especially Punjab. #MSG2Crossed300 House full shows in Bandi, Punjab. Spectacular craze among fans for @MSGTheFilm . pic.twitter.com/QzwbGVpyXd 
— GURMEET RAM RAHIM (@Gurmeetramrahim) October 12, 2015 
According to a press statement, MSG-2 The Messenger had collected Rs 275 crore in its third week itself. The ‘godman’ of Dera Sacha Sauda said about the movie’s success, “The reason behind the film’s success is a clean entertainment with a powerful message. The series of MSG films will not pause but only become stronger until all evils are eradicated from society.” 
“Films can initiate and sustain social change in today’s world. They can be used to defeat drug abuse and negativity,” he added, saying, “The parameter of this film’s success is thousands of youth who have quit drugs after seeing the film.” 
MSG-2 The Messenger is the sequel to MSG: The Messenger of God that released in early 2015 and was also a box office success. 
  9:04 AM Topics:
